name: Escape from the Swarm
description:
You're stuck on the planet swarming with aliens, buy your friends some time to prepare the spaceship. And one last thing, don't get swarmed.

You are wearing a combat suit that can generate shield fields to protect you against the enemy attack. 

Also, shooting an ion rifle is fun since you can't run out of bullets, be advised though, the generator on the rifle has a limited amount of energy, so count your shots.

Use W, A, S, D for movement, and mouse to aim. Left-click to shoot.

===========================================================

Made for 

b3agz Jam

Hosted by b3agz · #b3agzjam

Assets Creations:
